name: analytic

effect.scarlet_violet: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
effect.the_teal_mask: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
effect.the_indigo_disk: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
effect.legends_za: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.

short_effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's move if it is the last to act that turn.
